input.sentences: who does n't love going on a tour
the local architecture is always interesting
i love when there is a reenactment to go along with it
the walls are very interesting to look at it
sometimes it sad when the tour ends
output.sentences: I went on a tour in an old, beautiful town that I love.
I got to see a lot of fantastic local architecture, such as old buildings and statues.
I also was able to watch a reenactment of two people who fell in love in the city.
Even though it was a beautiful story, I found the walls to be the most endearing part of the town.
When the tour was over, I was sad we didn't get to visit the castle on the outskirts of town.
